mapper.insert: INSERT INTO PLAN_DATE ( P_NO_SEQ2, P_DAY, P_PLACE, USER_ID2 ) VALUES ( #{pNoSeq2}, #{pDay}, #{pPlace}, #{userId2} )
mapper.select: SELECT A.P_NO_SEQ2, TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(NVL(A.P_DAY, '')), 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS P_DAY, NVL(A.P_PLACE,'') AS P_PLACE, NVL(A.USER_ID2, '') AS USER_ID2 FROM PLAN_DATE A, PLAN_MAKE B WHERE A.P_NO_SEQ2 = B.P_NO_SEQ AND A.P_NO_SEQ2 = #{pNoSeq2}

SELECT NVL(D.P_NO_SEQ2, '') AS P_NO_SEQ2, NVL(M.USER_ID2, '') AS USER_ID2, NVL(M.P_TITLE, '') AS P_TITLE, M.REG_DATE2 AS REG_DATE2, TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(NVL(D.P_DAY, '')), 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS P_DAY, NVL(M.P_START, '') AS P_START, NVL(M.P_END, '') AS P_END, NVL(D.P_PLACE, '') AS P_PLACE FROM PLAN_MAKE M, PLAN_DATE D WHERE M.USER_ID2 = #{userId2} AND M.P_NO_SEQ = D.P_NO_SEQ2 ORDER BY P_DAY ASC

SELECT NVL(D.P_NO_SEQ2, '') AS P_NO_SEQ2, TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(NVL(D.P_DAY, '')), 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS P_DAY, NVL(D.P_PLACE, '') AS P_PLACE FROM PLAN_DATE D WHERE USER_ID2 = #{userId2} AND P_NO_SEQ2 = #{pNoSeq2} ORDER BY P_DAY ASC
